content.text:
# 2018 Queen's Club Championships – Doubles

Henri Kontinen John Peers
| runner   =  Jamie Murray Bruno Soares
| score    = 6–4, 6–3
| draw     = 16
| type     = queensclubtennistournament
| before_name = Aegon Championships – Doubles
| after_name  = Queen's Club Championships – Doubles
}}
Jamie Murray and Bruno Soares were the defending champions, but lost in the final to Henri Kontinen and John Peers, 4–6, 3–6.
Seeds
Oliver Marach /  Mate Pavić (semifinals)
